title: Classic Garlic Bread
description: Crispy homemade garlic bread with herbs
ingredients: 1 French baguette||1/2 cup butter softened||4 cloves garlic minced||2 tablespoons fresh parsley||1/4 teaspoon salt
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F||Cut baguette in half lengthwise||Mix butter, garlic, parsley, and salt||Spread mixture evenly on bread||Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden||Slice and serve hot
recipe_notes: For extra flavor, add a pinch of oregano to the butter mixture

title: Caesar Salad
ingredients: 1 large head romaine lettuce||1/2 cup Caesar dressing||1/4 cup grated Parmesan||1 cup croutons||2 anchovy fillets||1 clove garlic||2 tablespoons lemon juice||1 tablespoon Worcestershire
instructions: Wash and chop romaine lettuce||Make dressing by mashing garlic and anchovies||Whisk in lemon juice and Worcestershire||Toss lettuce with dressing||Top with Parmesan and croutons||Serve immediately
recipe_notes: Chill the plates beforehand for best presentation

title: Green Smoothie
description: Nutrient-packed smoothie with spinach and fruit
ingredients: 2 cups fresh spinach||1 banana||1 cup pineapple chunks||1/2 avocado||1 cup coconut water||1 tablespoon honey||1 tablespoon lime juice||1/2 cup ice
instructions: Add spinach and coconut water to blender first||Add banana, pineapple, and avocado||Add honey and lime juice||Blend until smooth||Add ice and blend again||Pour into glasses and serve immediately
recipe_notes: Add protein powder for post-workout boost

title: Trail Mix
description: Healthy mix of nuts, seeds, and dried fruit
ingredients: 1/2 cup almonds||1/2 cup walnuts||1/2 cup cashews||1/4 cup pumpkin seeds||1/4 cup sunflower seeds||1/2 cup dried cranberries||1/4 cup dark chocolate chips||1/4 teaspoon sea salt
instructions: Combine all nuts and seeds in large bowl||Add dried cranberries and chocolate chips||Sprinkle with sea salt||Toss to combine evenly||Store in airtight container||Portion into small bags for grab-and-go snacks
recipe_notes: Store in cool, dry place for up to 2 weeks

title: Grilled Chicken Breast
description: Perfectly seasoned and grilled chicken breast
ingredients: 4 boneless chicken breasts||2 tablespoons olive oil||1 teaspoon garlic powder||1 teaspoon paprika||1 teaspoon oregano||1/2 teaspoon salt||1/4 teaspoon black pepper||1 tablespoon lemon juice
instructions: Pound chicken to even thickness||Mix oil with all seasonings and lemon juice||Marinate chicken 30 minutes||Preheat grill to medium-high||Grill 6-7 minutes per side||Check internal temperature reaches 165°F||Rest 5 minutes before slicing
recipe_notes: Let chicken rest after cooking to retain juices

title: Spinach Artichoke Dip
description: Creamy cheesy dip with spinach and artichoke hearts
ingredients: 1 package cream cheese softened||1/4 cup mayonnaise||1/4 cup sour cream||1/4 cup Parmesan cheese||1/4 cup Romano cheese||2 cloves garlic minced||1/2 teaspoon dried basil||1 can artichoke hearts chopped||1 package frozen spinach thawed
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F||Mix cream cheese, mayo, sour cream, and cheeses||Stir in garlic and basil||Add artichoke hearts and spinach||Transfer to baking dish||Bake 20-25 minutes until bubbly||Serve with tortilla chips
recipe_notes: Squeeze excess water from spinach thoroughly

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: 2 1/4 cups flour||1 cup brown sugar||1/2 cup white sugar||1 cup butter softened||2 eggs||2 teaspoons vanilla||1 teaspoon baking soda||1 teaspoon salt||2 cups chocolate chips
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F||Cream butter and sugars||Add eggs and vanilla||Mix in dry ingredients||Fold in chocolate chips||Drop onto baking sheets||Bake 9-11 minutes||Cool on wire racks
recipe_notes: Don't overbake - cookies continue cooking on hot pan

title: Chicken Fajitas
description: Sizzling chicken fajitas with peppers and onions
ingredients: 1 lb chicken breast sliced||2 bell peppers sliced||1 large onion sliced||2 tablespoons olive oil||2 teaspoons chili powder||1 teaspoon cumin||1 teaspoon paprika||1/2 teaspoon garlic powder||Salt and pepper||8 tortillas||Sour cream and salsa for serving
instructions: Season chicken with spices||Heat oil in large skillet||Cook chicken 5-7 minutes||Add peppers and onions||Cook until vegetables are tender||Warm tortillas||Serve with toppings
recipe_notes: Cast iron skillet gives best searing results

title: Pancakes
description: Fluffy homemade pancakes perfect for breakfast
ingredients: 2 cups flour||2 tablespoons sugar||2 teaspoons baking powder||1 teaspoon salt||2 eggs||1 3/4 cups milk||1/4 cup melted butter||1 teaspoon vanilla
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in large bowl||Whisk wet ingredients separately||Combine wet and dry until just mixed||Heat griddle to 375°F||Pour 1/4 cup batter per pancake||Cook until bubbles form, flip once||Serve with syrup
recipe_notes: Don't overmix batter - lumps are okay

title: Turkey Club Sandwich
description: Classic club sandwich with turkey, bacon, and fresh vegetables
ingredients: 8 slices bread toasted||8 oz sliced turkey||8 strips bacon||4 lettuce leaves||2 tomatoes sliced||1/4 cup mayonnaise||Salt and pepper
instructions: Toast bread until golden||Cook bacon until crispy||Spread mayo on toast||Layer turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato||Season with salt and pepper||Cut diagonally and secure with toothpicks||Serve immediately
recipe_notes: Use thick-cut bacon for best texture
